entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Rogersville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:39 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Blowing snow late in the morning and early afternoon. Snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast late in the morning and in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
